


<!-- @namespace    sugar.node.is -->

# ```js path ```


Check if the passed string is a valid path or not

## Parameters

- **path**  String: The path to check



## Example (js)

```js
import isPath from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/path';
isPath('hello/world'); // => true
```
